description: Hot yoga has a new buddy. Asana ready, this short is packed with plenty of stretch, sweat-wicking properties (you'll be grateful for that, trust us), and an easy-on elastic waistband. And because we think you should be comfortable as you flow, we designed it with a built-in modesty panel.
name: Prana JD Chakara Shorts, 6" Inseam - Mens
